message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying.  Would you be willing to come down to $110?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to lower the price to $115. What do you think?
